alert.note: Alert for Baker; Columbia; Duval; Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued May 06 at 6:27PM EDT until May 06 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 188 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST FLORIDA BAKER DUVAL NASSAU IN NORTHERN FLORIDA COLUMBIA IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST GEORGIA BRANTLEY CAMDEN CHARLTON GLYNN PIERCE WARE WAYNE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMELIA CITY, ARLINGTON, ATKINSON, BLACKSHEAR, COLUMBIA, COUNTRY CLUB ESTATE, DOCK JUNCTION, DOCTORTOWN, DOVER BLUFF, DUNGENESS, FERNANDINA BEACH, FOLKSTON, GARDI, GLYNN HAVEN, HICKOX, HILLIARD, HOBOKEN, HOMELAND, HORTENSE, JACKSONVILLE, JEKYLL ISLAND, JESUP, KINGS FERRY, KINGSLAND, LAKE CITY, LULU, MACCLENNY, NAHUNTA, NEEDHAM, NORMANDY, OCEANWAY, OLENO STATE PARK, OLUSTEE, ORTEGA, RACE POND, RATLIFF, RAYBON, RIVERSIDE, SAN MARCO, SEA ISLAND, ST. GEORGE, ST. SIMONS, STEPHEN FOSTER STATE PARK, THALMANN, WATERTOWN, WAYCROSS, WAYNESVILLE, WINOKUR, AND YULEE.
